dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Glacier, the Frost Giant. What business do you have here, insignificant creature?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Such feeble words from a lesser being. Speak your purpose quickly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about this land. Could you guide me, wise Glacier?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? You are not worthy of the wisdom of the Frost Giants. Begone, before you face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my intrusion. I will leave now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies? Too little, too late. Prepare to face the consequences of your foolishness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave. I demand respect!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demand? You are as impudent as you are foolish. Then face the consequences of your defiance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Glacier! Let's settle this with a duel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? Very well, brave one. Prepare to be crushed under the might of the Frost Giants.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. You are too powerful for me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Yield? Cowardice is your only redeeming trait. Flee before I decide to crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight until the end! Prepare yourself, Glacier!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words. Let's see if your actions match them. Prepare for a bitter defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a gift as a token of peace. Will you accept it?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? What use do I have for trinkets from insignificant creatures like you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave now and bother you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave and never return. Your presence is an insult to the Frost Giants.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I insist you accept it. It is a sign of goodwill.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insist? Your persistence is irritating. Be gone before I decide to crush you along with your gift.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no business with you. I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No business? Then why do you dare to disturb the slumber of the Frost Giants?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the disturbance. I will leave at once.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies? Words are empty. Your actions speak louder. Leave swiftly or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge your authority! Who are you to question me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge me? You are but a speck in the eyes of the Frost Giants. Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see now that my actions were unwise. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom in defeat. Leave now, and do not provoke the Frost Giants again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down! Let's settle this with a battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Let your blood stain the snow as a warning to others who dare to question the Frost Giants.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I surrender. I have no desire for conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Surrender? Your weak spirit is pitiful. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight you until the end! Prepare for a fierce battle, Glacier!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fierce words. Let's see if your actions match them. Prepare for a bitter defeat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the Frost Giants. Prepare for a battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare challenge the might of Glacier, the Frost Giant? Your bravery is admirable but foolish.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider. It was a rash decision. I will depart now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Rash indeed. Depart before your regret grows along with my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand by my decision! Let's engage in combat, Glacier!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your blood shall feed the snow as a lesson to those who dare challenge the Frost Giants.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield. You have proven your strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Yield? Wise choice. Leave now before I decide to show no mercy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will fight with all my might! Prepare for a battle like no other!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words. Let's see if you can truly match the might of the Frost Giants.
